items.title: Emcure in pact to market and distribute Sanofi's oral diabetes portfolio in India
items.description: The partnership will see Emcure leverage its extensive network to distribute and promote well-established Sanofi brands such as Amaryl (glimepiride) and Cetapin (metformin).

items.title: DLF debuts in Mumbai with 'The Westpark' launch on July 17, 'premium' homes for Rs 5.5-7.5 crore
items.description: The Gurugram-based real estate firm will launch The Westpark project at the Oshiwara neighbourhood of Mumbai's Andheri suburb.

items.title: Newly-listed Schloss Bangalore, Crizac, Borana Weaves, other shares jump up to 6%
items.description: IPO stocks: This comes amid a tepid market, with benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty closing in the green with marginal gains.

items.title: Life insurance stocks find D-St favour as regulatory clouds clear, traditional policies gain traction
items.description: Brokerages have turned increasingly bullish on life insurance stocks over the past year, with all four major players - SBI Life, HDFC Life, LIC, and ICICI Prudential seeing more buy recommendations in a year

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty ends flat above 25,200 in a rangebound day, Sensex up 63 points
items.description: M&M, Wipro, SBI, Nestle India and Tech Mahindra were among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers included Shriram Finance, Eternal, Sun Pharma, Tata Steel and Cipla

items.title: SAT dismisses appeal to restrain the IPO of Smartworks Coworking: ‘Find no good reason’
items.description: An NGO had filed a plea in SAT seeking restraining the IPO process, alleging that some disclosures were not made, which company and promoters had denied.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top stocks that moved the most on July 16
items.description: From Coffee Day to Cement stocks, here are the top stocks that moved the most on July 16

items.title: Nippon Life India Asset Management shares rise 2.03%
items.description: The annual net profit increased from Rs 679.39 Crore in March 2021 to Rs 1,285.73 Crore in March 2025

items.title: Thermax, Patanjali Foods among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: The Nifty Midcap 150 index demonstrated notable activity, with Thermax, Patanjali Foods, Gland Pharma, Star Health, and Vodafone Idea stocks leading the gains in Wednesday's trading session.

items.title: MRF shares hit all-time high in Wednesday's trading session
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 151,525, MRF has demonstrated a strong market presence and financial performance.

items.title: HDFC Bank to consider its first-ever bonus issue: What it could mean for investors
items.description: Along with the bonus issue, the private lender is also set to consider and approve a dividend during its board meeting on July 19.

items.title: United Breweries shares rise over 2%
items.description: financial ratios for United Breweries show a P/E ratio of 119.64 and a P/B ratio of 12.12

items.title: Larsen & Toubro shares gain marginally in today's session; over 7.6 lakh shares traded
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 3,498.20, Larsen & Toubro has seen a marginal gain of 0.12% from the previous close in today's session.

items.title: Tata Steel, SAIL, other metal shares slump up to a percent, dragging Nifty Metal index as dollar rises on US inflation
items.description: Metal stocks: The rise in the US currency came after US inflation data for the month of June hinted at pressures from President Donald Trump's harsh tariffs, which in turn led to lower bets for Federal Reserve's rate cut.

items.title: Page Industries shares fall over 2% in Wednesday's session
items.description: The stock's movement reflected a notable shift in investor sentiment, with the decline placing it among the significant losers on the Nifty Midcap 150 index.

items.title: Thermax shares surge 5.77% amid high volume
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 3,680.00, Thermax has demonstrated significant upward movement in today's session

items.title: ICICI Bank shares edge marginally lower in Wednesday's trading session
items.description: In summary, ICICI Bank shares experienced a slight decline, trading at Rs 1,425.20. The bank has shown strong financial performance with increasing revenue and net profit over the past few years.

items.title: State Bank of India shares gain over 1%; stock among top gainers on Nifty 50
items.description: Moneycontrol analysis indicates a bullish sentiment on the stock as of July 16, 2025.
